values: When a relationship is intimate, the two things are very closely connected.
I only tell my secrets to my most intimate friends.
adj. having a very close relationship 亲密的
v. to say or suggest in an indirect way 暗示
n. 知己；至交 adj. 亲密的；私人的；精通的；有性关系的 vt. 暗示；通知；宣布
